item.title: Need help with my fletching addon with: sendFrame246
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Try this, I made something like that a while ago and it worked.
Replace

if(itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 5605) { sendFrame246(8870 , 250, 841); sendFrame246(8869 , 250, 839); sendFrame126("Short Bow",8871); sendFrame126("Short Bow",8874); sendFrame126("Long Bow",8878); sendFrame126("Long Bow",8875); sendFrame164(8866); }
With this

if(itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 5605) { Fletching(); }
Add this void

public void Fletching() { sendFrame246(8870 , 250, 841); sendFrame246(8869 , 250, 839); sendFrame126("Short Bow",8871); sendFrame126("Short Bow",8874); sendFrame126("Long Bow",8878); sendFrame126("Long Bow",8875); sendFrame164(8866); }
And these voids

[code]public void Short()
{
if(actionTimer == 0 && HasKnife() == true){
setAnimation(885);
sendMessage(“You cut the wood and get a shortbow!”);
deleteItem(1521,getItemSlot(1521),1);
addItem(50, 1);
addSkillXP(50, 9);
resetAnimation();
} else {
sendMessage(“You must have a knife.”);
}
}

public void Long()
{
if(actionTimer == 0 && HasKnife() == true){
setAnimation(885);
sendMessage(“You cut the wood and get a longbow!”);
deleteItem(1521,getItemSlot(1521),1);
addItem(48, 1);
addSkillXP(50, 9);
resetAnimation();
} else {
sendMessage(“You must have a knife.”);
}
}[/code]
The boolean for them having a knife

public boolean HasKnife() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 946) return true; else return false; }
This is the part I had some trouble on.
It might not work right now - the case ID is easy to get, just make a command that opens the frame for fletching and find the IDs off of it.

case 34174: //Shortbow Short(); break;
At the moment I have no ID for the longbow, I suggest you fix some of my work up and it’ll work perfectly.

Read full topic

That is my item on item.

notice this part:

sendFrame126("Short Bow",8874);

Now notice

8874

What case should i post the case 8874 undeR?

And this obviously means fletching will be in my SliPKnoT V2 (non-beta) Version.

I’ll be checking every so ofton i need rest b/c of stoopid school
